features: 【RAPID AND EFFICIENT】OMAIGA steam iron will quickly heat up in 30 seconds and provide a powerful steam output, and 20g / min steam rate can remove wrinkles of clothes easily and make clothes smooth and well pressed, showing your perfect look in a monent.

【POWERFUL MULTIFUNCTION】OMAIGA steam iron for clothes combines parallel and vertical steam, dry iron, and steam iron. With 3 adjustable steam settings (continuous steam, steam burst, and water spray) scientific steam hole distribution with the function of adjusting the steam output for more effective removal of wrinkles from clothing.

【NOT A USED IRON】Every iron for clothes needs to pass a functional TEST before going to the market, to prevent product quality problems from causing trouble to customers. So it is NORMAL when you see some WATER left in its tank. If you have any questions about this iron, please feel free to contact us, a one-year warranty is guaranteed.

【SELF-CLEANING & ANTI-DRIP】Our corded clothes iron with 1500W strong power. Built in self-cleaning, anti-calc and anti drip function, the iron can remove deposits to maintain performance and increase the iron's lifespan.

【WIDE APPLICATION】The steam iron for clothes is equipped with 3 temperature settings, allowing for use on a variety of fabrics including Nylon, Wool, Linen, Cotton, Silk, Synthetic and so on. The iron for clothes provides the optimal temperature for every type of clothing, unlike other one-temperature irons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Iron works great!
reviews.reviewText: This iron works great. Nice pointed plate at front -good for narrow folds when sewing. The temp dial is very hard to turn though, which is the only issue. Great quality & quick shipping. Thanks so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your clothes turn out beautiful and the wrinkles are gone
reviews.reviewText: I used this product to remove wrinkles from my clothes. Light weight heats up fast steam setting does not leave water spots. I would buy again if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little iron
reviews.reviewText: The ion is light weight, holds a decent amount of water. Instructions claims to use distilled water. Personal recommendation, empty the water out if not using for long periods of time and self clean after using to keep mineral deposits from forming.The sole plate dose not have steam vents near the center. The iron cuts off fairly quickly if let set to long. It does an okay job with continuous steam pressing, the steam burst isn't very powerful. For quilters, this is an okay iron. The sole plate doesn't cover a lot of area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this iron! The only thing I have an issue with is turning the setting dial because of arthritis on my hands...not a lot of room to grab the dial ... but I love it and would buy it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This Iron is so handy that I purchased it again. I reached out to the seller and received excellent customer service. So I purchased it again, and I am really pleased with it. I like the color black with no mess. It is clean and light weight for my hands. Thank you so much for all you do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the design of the iron. Has a wide base so it doesn't wobble. It heated up quickly. Fabric easily pressed. No problems. However. Very disappointed with the temperature control knob. Not easy to turn or access, and knob is low, not enough height to it to turn once I have a grip on the handle. Love the color, love the style. But that temperature knob being an issue, it is not worth keeping for the long run. Redesign and I will reconsider.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good steam, also has burst of steam
reviews.reviewText: Seams to be A very good iron
